name: exchain-analytics-adapter
description: Exchain Analytics Adapter v3.2.10 - Prebid.js module with unique IOID generation per auction cycle

scripts.install-instructions: echo "📋 Installation: Copy src/exchainAnalyticsAdapter/exchainAnalyticsAdapter.js to your Prebid.js modules/ directory and run: gulp build --modules=exchainAnalyticsAdapter"
scripts.copy-module: echo "ℹ️  Copy this file to your Prebid build: src/exchainAnalyticsAdapter/exchainAnalyticsAdapter.js -> modules/exchainAnalyticsAdapter.js"
scripts.prebid-build-help: echo "🔧 Build command: gulp build --modules=exchainAnalyticsAdapter,bidderA,bidderB (add your other modules)"
scripts.test: echo "✅ Module includes built-in error handling, console logging, and debug utilities for testing IOID uniqueness"

author: EXCHAIN PTE. LTD. <admin@exchain.co>
